ovdesc.p: This system updated table stores the IDs of Statement Entries (STMT.ENTRY records) to be reported in the next Account Statement for Statement Cycles greater than 1.

desc.p: This system updated table stores the IDs of Statement Entries (STMT.ENTRY records) to be reported in the next Account Statement Cycle for statement cycles greater than 1. For Account Statement with Cycle No. 2, the key of this table would be a valid Account record key. For Account Statements with Cycle No. greater than 2 (upto 9), key of this table would have two components a valid Account record key and the Account Statement Cycle No. both joined by a '.'

ID of the STMT.ENTRY record to be reported in the next Account Statement for Cycles greater than 1. The Cycle No. of the Account Statement is determined by the second part of the record ID. For Cycle No.2, second part of the record ID would be null.
